Storefront | Product Manager and Senior UI/UX Designer | New York, NY and Paris, FR | ONSITE | https://www.thestorefront.com

Storefront is the world's largest marketplace for short-term retail spaces. We make commercial real estate easily accessible for anyone looking to organize events and create pop-up stores around the world.

We're looking to grow our product team with a Product Manager in Paris and a Senior UX Designer in New York. You're the right fit if you are...

- passionate about building products that people love

- want to help us disrupt a multi-billion dollar industry

- humble, calm, and on top of things

- looking for an opportunity where you can grow and thrive

Check the listings at https://www.thestorefront.com/careers
